short_summary: Business process consultation for the nomination of individuals to the Order of Canada.
description: The Chancellery of Honours requires consulting services to review and analyse the current business processes relating to the nomination of individuals for the Order of Canada and the subsequent processes.
full_summary:
===========

### Tender Notice

**Title (English)/Titre (Français):** 2.5 Business Process Consultant (Senior) / AMA SPTS - 2.5 Expert-conseil en processus opérationnels

**Reference Number (English)/Référence (Français):** PW-22-01004172

### Tender Opportunities

This tender opportunity is for Consultant services to review and analyze business processes related to nominating individuals for the Order of Canada, with the aim of identifying inefficiencies and recommending improvements.

*   **Category:** SRV
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Contract Details

*   **Contracting Entity:** Governor General
*   **Contracting Entity Address:** Ridau Hall, 1 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0A1

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Stephanie Patry
*   **Email:** [stephanie.patry@gg.ca](mailto:stephanie.patry@gg.ca)
*   **Phone:** (613) 971-2394

### Tender Submission

The tender submission must include a written proposal that addresses the requirements outlined in the tender document. The deadline for submission is September 1, 2022, at 2:00 PM

### Documents

The tender document can be found at the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/12/d86380d0380f53dbe17fae91d98979ad/20220687_-_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/12/d86380d0380f53dbe17fae91d98979ad/20220687_-_npp_en.pdf) (English)

and

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/12/3399aaac0ccecb579ce739c915266cc2/20220687_-_npp_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/12/3399aaac0ccecb579ce739c915266cc2/20220687_-_npp_fr.pdf) (French) Outline of the Project for a 2.5 Business Process Consultant (Senior)
